io.lettuce.core.api.reactive

接口 RedisHashReactiveCommands<K,V>

  • 类型参数:
    K - Key type.
    V - Value type.
    所有已知子接口:
    RedisAdvancedClusterReactiveCommands<K,V>, RedisClusterPubSubReactiveCommands<K,V>, RedisClusterReactiveCommands<K,V>, RedisPubSubReactiveCommands<K,V>, RedisReactiveCommands<K,V>
    所有已知实现类:
    AbstractRedisReactiveCommands, RedisAdvancedClusterReactiveCommandsImpl, RedisPubSubReactiveCommandsImpl, RedisReactiveCommandsImpl, RedisSentinelReactiveCommandsImpl

    public interface RedisHashReactiveCommands<K,V>
    Reactive executed commands for Hashes (Key-Value pairs).
    从以下版本开始:
    4.0

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明

      Delete one or more hash fields.
      reactor.core.publisher.Mono<Boolean> hexists(K key, K field)
      Determine if a hash field exists.

      Stream over all the fields and values in a hash.

      Increment the integer value of a hash field by the given number.

      Stream over the values of all the given hash fields.

      Get the values of all the given hash fields.

      Set multiple hash fields to multiple values.

      Incrementally iterate hash fields and associated values.

    • 方法详细资料

      • hdel

        reactor.core.publisher.Mono<Long> hdel(K key,
                                       K... fields)
        Delete one or more hash fields.
        参数:
        key - the key
        fields - the field type: key
        返回:
        Long integer-reply the number of fields that were removed from the hash, not including specified but non existing fields.

      • hexists

        reactor.core.publisher.Mono<Boolean> hexists(K key,
                                             K field)
        Determine if a hash field exists.
        参数:
        key - the key
        field - the field type: key
        返回:
        Boolean integer-reply specifically: true if the hash contains field. false if the hash does not contain field, or key does not exist.

      • hget

        reactor.core.publisher.Mono<V> hget(K key,
                                    K field)
        Get the value of a hash field.
        参数:
        key - the key
        field - the field type: key
        返回:
        V bulk-string-reply the value associated with field, or null when field is not present in the hash or key does not exist.

      • hincrby

        reactor.core.publisher.Mono<Long> hincrby(K key,
                                          K field,
                                          long amount)
        Increment the integer value of a hash field by the given number.
        参数:
        key - the key
        field - the field type: key
        amount - the increment type: long
        返回:
        Long integer-reply the value at field after the increment operation.

      • hincrbyfloat

        reactor.core.publisher.Mono<Double> hincrbyfloat(K key,
                                                 K field,
                                                 double amount)
        Increment the float value of a hash field by the given amount.
        参数:
        key - the key
        field - the field type: key
        amount - the increment type: double
        返回:
        Double bulk-string-reply the value of field after the increment.

      • hgetall

        reactor.core.publisher.Mono<Map<K,V>> hgetall(K key)
        Get all the fields and values in a hash.
        参数:
        key - the key
        返回:
        Map<K,V> array-reply list of fields and their values stored in the hash, or an empty list when key does not exist.

      • hgetall

        reactor.core.publisher.Mono<Long> hgetall(KeyValueStreamingChannel<K,V> channel,
                                          K key)
        Stream over all the fields and values in a hash.
        参数:
        channel - the channel
        key - the key
        返回:
        Long count of the keys.

      • hkeys

        reactor.core.publisher.Flux<K> hkeys(K key)
        Get all the fields in a hash.
        参数:
        key - the key
        返回:
        K array-reply list of fields in the hash, or an empty list when key does not exist.

      • hkeys

        reactor.core.publisher.Mono<Long> hkeys(KeyStreamingChannel<K> channel,
                                        K key)
        Stream over all the fields in a hash.
        参数:
        channel - the channel
        key - the key
        返回:
        Long count of the keys.

      • hlen

        reactor.core.publisher.Mono<Long> hlen(K key)
        Get the number of fields in a hash.
        参数:
        key - the key
        返回:
        Long integer-reply number of fields in the hash, or 0 when key does not exist.

      • hmget

        reactor.core.publisher.Flux<KeyValue<K,V>> hmget(K key,
                                                 K... fields)
        Get the values of all the given hash fields.
        参数:
        key - the key
        fields - the field type: key
        返回:
        V array-reply list of values associated with the given fields, in the same

      • hmget

        reactor.core.publisher.Mono<Long> hmget(KeyValueStreamingChannel<K,V> channel,
                                        K key,
                                        K... fields)
        Stream over the values of all the given hash fields.
        参数:
        channel - the channel
        key - the key
        fields - the fields
        返回:
        Long count of the keys

      • hmset

        reactor.core.publisher.Mono<String> hmset(K key,
                                          Map<K,V> map)
        Set multiple hash fields to multiple values.
        参数:
        key - the key
        map - the null
        返回:
        String simple-string-reply

      • hscan

        reactor.core.publisher.Mono<MapScanCursor<K,V>> hscan(K key)
        Incrementally iterate hash fields and associated values.
        参数:
        key - the key
        返回:
        MapScanCursor<K, V> map scan cursor.

      • hscan

        reactor.core.publisher.Mono<MapScanCursor<K,V>> hscan(K key,
                                                      ScanArgs scanArgs)
        Incrementally iterate hash fields and associated values.
        参数:
        key - the key
        scanArgs - scan arguments
        返回:
        MapScanCursor<K, V> map scan cursor.

      • hscan

        reactor.core.publisher.Mono<MapScanCursor<K,V>> hscan(K key,
                                                      ScanCursor scanCursor,
                                                      ScanArgs scanArgs)
        Incrementally iterate hash fields and associated values.
        参数:
        key - the key
        scanCursor - cursor to resume from a previous scan, must not be null
        scanArgs - scan arguments
        返回:
        MapScanCursor<K, V> map scan cursor.

      • hscan

        reactor.core.publisher.Mono<MapScanCursor<K,V>> hscan(K key,
                                                      ScanCursor scanCursor)
        Incrementally iterate hash fields and associated values.
        参数:
        key - the key
        scanCursor - cursor to resume from a previous scan, must not be null
        返回:
        MapScanCursor<K, V> map scan cursor.

      • hscan

        reactor.core.publisher.Mono<StreamScanCursor> hscan(KeyValueStreamingChannel<K,V> channel,
                                                    K key)
        Incrementally iterate hash fields and associated values.
        参数:
        channel - streaming channel that receives a call for every key-value pair
        key - the key
        返回:
        StreamScanCursor scan cursor.

      • hscan

        reactor.core.publisher.Mono<StreamScanCursor> hscan(KeyValueStreamingChannel<K,V> channel,
                                                    K key,
                                                    ScanArgs scanArgs)
        Incrementally iterate hash fields and associated values.
        参数:
        channel - streaming channel that receives a call for every key-value pair
        key - the key
        scanArgs - scan arguments
        返回:
        StreamScanCursor scan cursor.

      • hscan

        reactor.core.publisher.Mono<StreamScanCursor> hscan(KeyValueStreamingChannel<K,V> channel,
                                                    K key,
                                                    ScanCursor scanCursor,
                                                    ScanArgs scanArgs)
        Incrementally iterate hash fields and associated values.
        参数:
        channel - streaming channel that receives a call for every key-value pair
        key - the key
        scanCursor - cursor to resume from a previous scan, must not be null
        scanArgs - scan arguments
        返回:
        StreamScanCursor scan cursor.

      • hscan

        reactor.core.publisher.Mono<StreamScanCursor> hscan(KeyValueStreamingChannel<K,V> channel,
                                                    K key,
                                                    ScanCursor scanCursor)
        Incrementally iterate hash fields and associated values.
        参数:
        channel - streaming channel that receives a call for every key-value pair
        key - the key
        scanCursor - cursor to resume from a previous scan, must not be null
        返回:
        StreamScanCursor scan cursor.

      • hset

        reactor.core.publisher.Mono<Boolean> hset(K key,
                                          K field,
                                          V value)
        Set the string value of a hash field.
        参数:
        key - the key
        field - the field type: key
        value - the value
        返回:
        Boolean integer-reply specifically: true if field is a new field in the hash and value was set. false if field already exists in the hash and the value was updated.

      • hsetnx

        reactor.core.publisher.Mono<Boolean> hsetnx(K key,
                                            K field,
                                            V value)
        Set the value of a hash field, only if the field does not exist.
        参数:
        key - the key
        field - the field type: key
        value - the value
        返回:
        Boolean integer-reply specifically: 1 if field is a new field in the hash and value was set. 0 if field already exists in the hash and no operation was performed.

      • hstrlen

        reactor.core.publisher.Mono<Long> hstrlen(K key,
                                          K field)
        Get the string length of the field value in a hash.
        参数:
        key - the key
        field - the field type: key
        返回:
        Long integer-reply the string length of the field value, or 0 when field is not present in the hash or key does not exist at all.

      • hvals

        reactor.core.publisher.Flux<V> hvals(K key)
        Get all the values in a hash.
        参数:
        key - the key
        返回:
        V array-reply list of values in the hash, or an empty list when key does not exist.

      • hvals

        reactor.core.publisher.Mono<Long> hvals(ValueStreamingChannel<V> channel,
                                        K key)
        Stream over all the values in a hash.
        参数:
        channel - streaming channel that receives a call for every value
        key - the key
        返回:
        Long count of the keys.
